name: WE Solutions
goal:
WE Solutions specializes in organizational change management and project management using the latest information technology and knowledge management techniques.
We help organisations become smarter and more intelligent.
We enable organisations to learn about online work practice and the behavior of people in virtual worlds.
We help organisations create a business strategy and appropriate goals. We teach and help organisations to communicate, grow, operate and learn more effectively.
We focus on the human aspect of learning and technology.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Audiovisual and Media, Budget, Climate Action, Communication, Competition, Consumer Affairs, Culture, Customs, Development, Economic and Financial Affairs, Education, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Enlargement, Enterprise, Environment, External Relations, Financial Stability, Financial Services and Capital Markets Union , Fisheries and Aquaculture, Food Safety, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, General and Institutional Affairs, Home Affairs, Humanitarian Aid, Information Society, Internal Market, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Public Health, Regional Policy, Research and Technology, Sport, Taxation, Trade, Trans-European Networks, Transport, Youth
euInitiatives: Mainly following Twitter accounts of Directorate Generals, Agencies, commissioners, European Parliament, ... to get a good understanding of EU initiatives and policies
